62.ara-name: كتاب فضائل أصحاب النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:Once the Prophet (ﷺ) embraced me (pressed me to his chest) and said, "O Allah, teach him wisdom (i.e. the understanding of the knowledge of Qur'an)

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرُ ابْنِ عَبَّاسٍ رضى الله عنهما
chapter.eng-name: Narrations about Ibn 'Abbas رضي الله عنهما

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdul Warith: The same but said, "O Allah, teach him (Ibn Abbas) the Book (i.e. the understanding of the knowledge of Qur'an)." Narrated Khalid: As above

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرُ ابْنِ عَبَّاسٍ رضى الله عنهما
chapter.eng-name: Narrations about Ibn 'Abbas رضي الله عنهما
